        public void requestAoiInfo​(com.baidu.mapapi.model.LatLng latLng,

                           BroadPoiProcess.onAoiInfoCallback callback)
        request Aoi Info when click child POI in search page.

      • processAoiInfo

        public void processAoiInfo​(@NonNull
                           AoiBean.AoiInfo aoiInfo,
                           boolean autoZoom)
        draw broad-poi overlay on the map

        if param autoZoom is set true , then show the zoom level that calculated from boundary point list ,otherwise , the map will not to be zoomed

        参数:
        aoiInfo - data
        autoZoom - is need calculate zoom level

      • isTargetInChildPoi

        public com.baidu.mapapi.map.Marker isTargetInChildPoi​(com.baidu.mapapi.model.LatLng target,
                                                      float currentZoom)
        detect whether the target pint is hit the Marker fence. if target is been hit, we will return current hit marker ,otherwise , null will be returned

      • handMarkerCollision

        参数:

        返回:
